name: Amur Leopard
alt: The Amur leopard is a subspecies native to the Primorye region of southeastern Russia and northern China.

name: Black Rhino
alt: The black rhinoceros or hook-lipped rhinoceros is a species of rhinoceros, native to eastern and southern Africa.

name: Bornean Orangutan
alt: The Bornean orangutan is a critically endangered species, with deforestation, palm oil plantations, and hunting posing a serious threat to its continued existence.

name: Cross River Gorilla
Range: Forested hills and mountains of the Cameroon-Nigeria border region
alt: Cross River gorillas are scattered across the lowland forests and rainforests of Cameroon and Nigeria,

name: Eastern Lowland Gorilla
Range: Mountainous forests of Nigeria and Cameroon
alt: The eastern lowland gorilla has the widest altitudinal range of any of the gorilla subspecies, being found in mountainous, transitional and lowland tropical forests.

name: Hawksbill Sea Turtle
alt: There have been population declines over the course of several decades, largely due to being hunted for their meat, eggs and shells.

name: Javan Rhino
alt: Javan rhinos are found in only one national park on the northern tip of the Indonesian island of Java

name: Malaysian Tiger
alt: Malayan tigers are poached due to the high demand for products made from tiger parts

name: Sumatran Orangutan
alt: Only seven of thier populations have prospects of long-term viability, each with an estimated 250 or more individuals

name: Saola
alt: The Saolo is a forest-dwelling bovine found only in the Annamite Range of Vietnam and Laos

name: South China Tiger
alt: There were no more than 4,000 tigers in the wild when the South China Tiger, sadly, became the target of Mao Zedong's 'anti-pest' campaign, named The 'Great Leap Forward'.

name: Sumatran Elephant
alt: Sumatra has experienced one of the highest rates of deforestation due to the pulp and paper industries and palm oil plantations

name: Sumatran Orangutan
alt: Habitat destruction is the biggest reason Sumatran orangutans are endangered and they are now only found in northern Sumatra.

name: Sumatran Rhino
alt: Indonesia hold the only viable population, thanks to Poaching. Malaysia's population is now extinct.

name: Sumatran Tiger
alt: Logging, and hunting have reduced the Sumatran tiger population by 80%.

name: Vaquita
Range: Northern part of Gulf of California
alt: Totoaba swim bladders are believed to cure a variety of illness and diseases in Chinese medicine. Unfortunately, unsustainable and illegal fishing practices are pushing the vaquita to extinction.

name: Saiga antelope
alt: Hunting and fences, along with warmer weather and increased humidity have led to mass mortalities over the last 25 years

name: Pangolin
alt: Illegal international tra`de of their skins, scales and meat has caused the Pangolin to be endangered.
